Actions.Name: List All Datasets
Actions.Description:
Lists all of the datasets available on the tenant.
https://app.archbee.io/docs/RHl7SG2eUFckQNrUgXcGp/6VcSt63koHgyePk72r0pR

Actions.Name: Get Dataset Information
Actions.Description:
Retrieve a specific dataset instance. The returned dataset record may require additional parsing before using downstream in the workflow.
https://app.archbee.io/docs/RHl7SG2eUFckQNrUgXcGp/dowMAn1aXoA6vyOj24fOr

Actions.Name: Upload Document File
Actions.Description: Uploads a file to a Data Inbox tenant for processing.

Actions.Name: Get Document File (Original Format)
Actions.Description: Downloads a copy of the document file posted to Data Inbox in its original format.

Actions.Name: Get Document File (PDF Format)
Actions.Description: Downloads a copy of the document file posted to Data Inbox in a converted PDF format.

Actions.Name: List All Documents
Actions.Description:
Lists all of the documents available on the tenant.
https://app.archbee.io/docs/RHl7SG2eUFckQNrUgXcGp/7DOwvq52yx9eVF2KFpkQH

Actions.Name: When An Alkymi Event Triggers
Actions.Description: This trigger is executed when any of the selected Alkymi events occur.

Actions.Name: List All Executions
Actions.Description:
Lists all of the executions available on the tenant.
https://app.archbee.io/docs/RHl7SG2eUFckQNrUgXcGp/7qd1-PJ-P40RFf7ocIK5g

Actions.Name: List All Patterns
Actions.Description:
List all of the patterns available on the tenant.
https://app.archbee.io/docs/RHl7SG2eUFckQNrUgXcGp/O_NVlCnEFDOAQPWev_rdb

Actions.Name: Get Pattern Information
Actions.Description: Retrieve a specific pattern instance. The returned pattern record may require additional parsing before using downstream in the workflow.

Actions.Name: List All Records
Actions.Description:
Lists all of the records available on the tenant. For example, you can return all records for a specific pattern if the tenant is configured with multiple patterns.
https://app.archbee.io/docs/RHl7SG2eUFckQNrUgXcGp/AxGvA5pWxls9DWOMUE1qs

Actions.Name: Get Record Information
Actions.Description:
Retrieve a specific record instance. The returned record object may require additional parsing before using downstream in the workflow.
https://app.archbee.io/docs/RHl7SG2eUFckQNrUgXcGp/HEVS5cHZTtViD4_F6BLlM
